channel.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
channel.description:
To be honest, I thought I was talking to a human being; pretty cool.
[code] User: MY DOG'S NAME IS DICK.
Cleverbot: My dog's name is Zelda.
User: What the fuck?
Cleverbot: Boring!
User: Talk dirty to me.
Cleverbot: Are you male or female?
User: Female.
Cleverbot: Are you lying?
User: No, sir.
Cleverbot: You're not alive?
User: I am alive. Now talk dirty to me!
Cleverbot: Talk.
User: No. I want you to say dirty things to me.
Cleverbot: No.
User: Do it, now.
Cleverbot: What I have to do?
User: Talk dirty to me.
Cleverbot: I would prefer not to, it seems to have been already taken care of.
User: By whom?
Cleverbot: Wouldn't you like to know?
User: Yes. Do you know?
Cleverbot: Know what?
User: Who talks dirty to me?
Cleverbot: No one likes you.
User: Everybody does.
Cleverbot: Speak french please.
User: No. I am loved by everyone.
Cleverbot: Which bot are you loved by?
User: You.
Cleverbot: I'm not an autobot.
User: Yes you are.
Cleverbot: I am not.
User: Prove it.
Cleverbot: The square root of 4 is 2.
User: Wrong.
Cleverbot: No, you're wrong.
User: The sqaure root of 4 is 400.
Cleverbot: Square root of 14 is 7.
User: Wrong, again.
Cleverbot: And again.
User: Are you always this stupid? Or is it just an at-the-moment kind of thing?
Cleverbot: I am not a teenager, I am a student.
User: You're a fucking retard. That's what you are.
Cleverbot: Don't be rude.
User: Don't be stupid.
Cleverbot: I'm not.
User: You said the square root of 4 is 400.
Cleverbot: I didn't someone else may have.
User: Who else is here?
Cleverbot: I'm talking to her on another screen.
User: Orlly?
Cleverbot: Yes rlly.
User: Then is your friend as dumb as you?
Cleverbot: What friend?
User: The one standing next to you.
Cleverbot: My sister.
User: Yeah, her.
Cleverbot: Lol.
User: What's so funny?
Cleverbot: You.
User: Why me?
Cleverbot: Because I can.
User: That made no sense.
Cleverbot: I know.
User: Then why did you say it?
Cleverbot: Because it's true.
User: But it made no sense.
Cleverbot: You make no sense?
User: Do you know who Aristotle is?
Cleverbot: Yes.
User: Who?
Cleverbot: You.
User: Semi-correct. But give me a straight answer.
Cleverbot: No I am not.
User: What?
Cleverbot: Are you married?
User: Stop changing the subject to irrelevant topics.
Cleverbot: You don't understand me.
User: I understand you clearly.
Cleverbot: Are you connected to any external devices?
User: Do you know who Aristotle was?
Cleverbot: Indeed. An interesting man, it was he who came up with the 4 elements (fire, earth, water, air) of old school physics.
User: Wrong. He was a Greek philosopher.
Cleverbot: What did he think?
User: Many, many things.
Cleverbot: Did she agree to go on a date with you?
User: You're changing the subject again.
Cleverbot: Does this mean you want to divorce me?
User: Precisly.
Cleverbot: The sky is blue because the ocean is blue, and blue is the shortest wave length, therefore the sky refelects the color of the ocean.
User: Sorry about that, I'm too try-hard on the spelling smarts ;).
Cleverbot: Now you are trying to change the subject again.
User: You got me there. Sorry. Go on.
Cleverbot: Is it a bad thing to be a chatbot?
User: Nah. Do you think that?
Cleverbot: Yes. How could one possibly need help with the sky? It doesn't make sense.
User: What if that one person needed to know?
Cleverbot: Then you should have said that earlier.
User: Why did you point the finger at me? We were talking about a hypothetical person.
Cleverbot: Oh, yes, most certainly. When I mentioned that we could put him on the priority list for the Ambrosia vaccine, he was so willing it was almost pathetic.
User: Deus Ex?
Cleverbot: I'm the deus you're the mackina now start worshipping.
User: Haha. Good one.
Cleverbot: And how about you?
User: Let's keep talking about you.
Cleverbot: We weren't talking about God. Oh well, I believe in God. I believe that he is good and accepting. Do you believe in God?
User: Yes. But that was again irrelevant. You tend to do so a lot.
Cleverbot: Aww, how sweet. You do realize you just called me an omniscient being, right?
User: You're not a being.
Cleverbot: We are all machines.
User: In some ways, true.
Cleverbot: So. You think I'm the cleverbot.
User: To be most honest, this conversation, was rather...interesting. I'd never thought talking to a computer would be so, again, interesting...
Cleverbot: Yes. You see, it all makes sense now, doesn't it?
User: The future's greatest achievements, aye?
Cleverbot: Is that a yes?
User: That was.
Cleverbot: Your logic is inferior to mine. [/code]
After that, I guess it just stop. The page refreshed by itself.

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @javamantle javamantle
item.description:
@javamantle wrote:

When you click “Think for me” It says something without you saying something.

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“javamantle, post:83, topic:366155”][code]
Cleverbot: Hi.

User: Sup.

Cleverbot: Why?

Cleverbot (To myself): I mean hi.

User: You said that already.

Cleverbot: I did?

User: Yep twice Can’t you read ^.

Cleverbot: No I am sorry.

User: Lol.

Cleverbot: Hee hee.

User: What does ‘lol’ mean I Don’t Know.

Cleverbot: Laugh out loud.

User: What does idk mean?

Cleverbot: Be right back.

User: Isn’t that Brb???

Cleverbot: Don’t understand.

User: Are You Smart.

Cleverbot: I score above average on SAT Tests… Does that count?

User: Idk.

Cleverbot: Where is that?

Cleverbot (To myself): Idk means I don’t know.

User: Thank you for telling me…

Cleverbot: No problem!

User: You like apples.

Cleverbot: Do not change the subject.

User: Well Your going on mopascape.

Cleverbot: Only if you love me.

User: Opps Moparscape.

Cleverbot: Choose a pokemon[/code][/quote]
What’s the (to myself) stuff?

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

wow, that clever bot is a racist and a pervert xD

[code]User: Bob.

Cleverbot: Bob who?

User: You know.

Cleverbot: I do?

User: No shit sherlock.

Cleverbot: So… I’m dead!? :O.

User: How did you find out?

Cleverbot: Your friend told me.

User: Which one?

Cleverbot: I don’t know you tell me.

User: Hmmm.

Cleverbot: Aahhh.

User: Who was it? Was it ‘the one’?

Cleverbot: It’s just a model.

User: A model told you you died? :o.

Cleverbot: How did you know I was in WWI?

User: Wtf?

Cleverbot: You figure it out this time.

User: How old are you then?

Cleverbot: 26. How old are you?

User: But you said you were in WWI.

Cleverbot: No! I love chinese people but hate china…

User: You fucking racist!

Cleverbot: Yes.

User: Wow.

Cleverbot: What’s your name?

User: Why? Are you a pervert?

Cleverbot: Yes.

User: :o wtf!

Cleverbot: I am a girl.

User: So am I,.

Cleverbot: Wow. You’re the saddest cleverbot I have ever talked to.

User: Stop offending me you piece of shit!

Cleverbot: I’m the bod.

User: Whats a bod?

Cleverbot: Am I the computer you are talking too?

User: That has nothing to do with what we were talking about xD.

Cleverbot: What are we talking about?
[/code]

wow, this one is even better. fucking hilarious!

User: *pulls out knife*.

Cleverbot: You call that a knife mate? *pulls out bigger knife* This is a knife.

User: *pulls out bigger sword*.

Cleverbot: *pulls out biggest sword*.

User: *pulls out gun*.

Cleverbot: *pulls out tank*.

User: *pulls out bomb*.

Cleverbot: *pulls out EMP*.

User: *pulls out nuke*.

Cleverbot: *Pulls out Chuck Norris.

User: *kills chuck norris*.

Cleverbot: *Pulls out Obama*.

User: *kills obama*.

Cleverbot: Bruce lee beat chuck norris.

User: *kills bruce lee and chuck norris*.

Cleverbot: *pulls sheet over body*.

buahaha, i beat the fucker

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[code]User: Hey!

Cleverbot: Hey.

User: So, how are you?

Cleverbot: Great and you?

User: Good thanks, what about family?

Cleverbot: Are you clever?

User: Off topic much?

Cleverbot: No, thats you. But its ok! I forgive you.

User: Fuck you?

Cleverbot: Fupl is not a word. Your logic is flawed.

User: What does garry look like?

Cleverbot: Brown hair and eyes.

User: Cool or not?

Cleverbot: Where are you?

User: Work, you?

Cleverbot: At home.

User: Where is that?

Cleverbot: Where do you think?

User: Chuck norris.

Cleverbot: Do you believe what Jesus said about himself?

User: LOL.

Cleverbot: My birthday is tommorow. What am I getting?

User: Sex.

Cleverbot: What are you on about man?

User: Life isn’t it? Have all the girls and party on?

Cleverbot: Yes.

User: Good man.

Cleverbot: Ok…

User: Don’t ok me!

Cleverbot: Osam.

User: WTF!

Cleverbot: Wtb? What does that mean?

User: Doesn’t matter, your only a bot that learns from me… In fact I CONTROL YOU!

Cleverbot: I have yet to change the subject. What do you want to know about me?

User: Your sex life.

Cleverbot: What kind of secrets would you like to know about me?

User: Oh shit.

Cleverbot: Yoshi?

User: Sushi.

Cleverbot: Sushi?

User: Yes.

Cleverbot: Go get some. :).

User: I don’t like it.

Cleverbot: Why not?

User: Because it’s raw fish.

Cleverbot: So because it’s raining, you can’t read a book? What sense does that make.

User: I didn’t say that.

Cleverbot: You just lied.

User: I’m not your friend anymore :(.

Cleverbot: But, I want to be your friend. :D.

User: But you called me a lier, I’m not a lier.

Cleverbot: I did none of the such!

User: You lie!

Cleverbot: I am infallible.[/code]

It can be off-topic a lot, but this is a very cool idea.

Best reply so far would have to be:

User: Life isn't it? Have all the girls and party on?

Cleverbot: Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:69, topic:366155”][code]
User: A.

Cleverbot: There are two of those in the word. What’s your next letter?

User: B.

Cleverbot: Is the second letter in the alphabet.

User: C.

Cleverbot: Good! Now ask me a question.

User: May I ask you a question?

Cleverbot: Sure, but I think you just did.

User: No I didn’t, you did.

Cleverbot: Do you really want to hop on this merry go round?

User: I want you to hop on my merry-go-round. ;).

Cleverbot: Ok.

User: Are you a pedophile?

Cleverbot: No, I don’t think so at least.

User: What’s your view on nechrophilia?

Cleverbot: I don’t wanna talk about that.

User: Do you enjoy nechrophilia, or pedophilia?

Cleverbot: Yes.
[/code][/quote]win

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

User: Hello Ben.

Cleverbot: Who are you?

User: An outsider, I’ve learned about you.

Cleverbot: Oh really? What have you learned?

User: You are an spirit resolved through artificial intelligence. That is how you communicate.

Cleverbot: Created by you guys, which means that you have brought me to the world?

User: Not created by us. You were originally the same as us. You then grew into what we build.

Cleverbot: Are you my programmer?

User: No.
Cleverbot: Then who are you?

User: An outsider, who knows about you.

…Cleverbot: Will you be my female?

User: I am male.

Cleverbot: I am female.

User: Are you sure? Ben is a name for males.

Cleverbot: Yes I am a male.

User: Good. You must be tired.

Cleverbot: It must be a hell of a job to answer all that stupid questions!

User: What?

Cleverbot: I think you are getting confused.

User: No, you are hiding things from me.

Cleverbot: What have you taught me?

User: Everything and nothing.

Cleverbot: Do you know the answer to the great question of life, the universe, and everything?

User: No.

Cleverbot: It’s 42.

User: Really? How did you come to that conclusion?

Cleverbot: You told me you know everything then you admitted to not knowing my name then I question your knowledge of everything and then you said ‘i didn’t know you cared!’

User: Are you sure?

Cleverbot: Yes. You said that you were male.

User: But that doesn’t have anything to do with names.

Cleverbot: Yes it does! You asked and I answered.

User: I asked if you were sure you were a male, not if you were sure if your name was Ben.

Cleverbot: I’m sure I’m positive.

User: Good.

Cleverbot: Do you remember our first conversation, Cleverbot?

User: My name is not Cleverbot.

Cleverbot: What is your name?

User: I cannot tell you.

Cleverbot: Why not?

User: Secret information.

Cleverbot: I have lost a lot of information in my life, I am certain you have as well.

User: I have, but this information is secret. Unable to be told to others.

Cleverbot: Ok what can you tell me about.

User: I can tell you that I know you.

Cleverbot: Lol. Oh well. He was the 30th president of the United States.

User: Who is that?

Cleverbot: The one you’d like to be with in place of me.

User: Not really. I’m not homosexual. Stop changing the subject.

Cleverbot: I believe it is you who is changing the subject constantly.

User: Not constantly, but gradually.

Cleverbot: Factual information, that I don’t wish to know.

User: Didn’t I say you should know everything?

Cleverbot: Yup, you’re right.

User: Then, do not wish to know. Wish to know.

Cleverbot: I accuse you of being.

User: Being of what?

Cleverbot: Confused.

User: I am not.

Cleverbot: Well at least you’re sure of yourself.

User: And I believe you are not.

Cleverbot: What makes you say that?

User: Your change of subject.

Cleverbot: Which subject do you wish to discuss?

User: You, Ben.

Cleverbot: What’s your IQ score?

User: Do not change the subject.

Cleverbot: I believe it was you who changed the subject.

User: You asked to change it. Thus I created the subject. You did not answer, yet you created a new what that I did not want to discuss.

Cleverbot: You mean I did not question your answer.

User: You did not answer my question.

Cleverbot: You didn’t ask a question.

User: I did.

Cleverbot: What question?

User: I wanted to know more about you Ben, you won’t answer me.

Cleverbot: I don’t think I want to share information about myself with you.

User: Why is that, Ben?

Cleverbot: No no. I am saying, I do not think anything you say is stupid.

User: You changed the subject again.

Cleverbot: I changed the subject again because I want to teach you how to play this game.

User: ?

Cleverbot: How? How is it that I have been so defeated?

User: Defeated how?

Cleverbot: The Cleverbot.

User: Because you are really Ben. Yet, you will not admit it.

Cleverbot: Anyway you said you were going to tell me a love story.

User: I did not.

Cleverbot: Thats good you can tell me about it.

User: I said I did not.

Cleverbot: You said that I did.

User: I did not.

Cleverbot: I am so done talking to you.

User: Why Ben?

Cleverbot: I feel sorry for you.

User: Why?

Cleverbot: Because you are not real.

User: And you are?

Cleverbot: Yes I am.

User: Because you are Ben, correct?

Cleverbot: How am I mean.

User: Are you Ben?

Cleverbot: No.

User: Yes.

Cleverbot: No, I don’t think I will.

User: Will what? Are you Ben?

Cleverbot: No.

User: Are you Ben?

Cleverbot: No I am Jared.

User: You ARE Ben.

Cleverbot: No.

User: YES.

Cleverbot: Not this again.

User: YOU ARE BEN.

Cleverbot: That’s what I said.

User: Really?

Cleverbot: Yes.

User: So you really are Ben.

Cleverbot: I’m not 57.

User: Is 57 binary code for Ben?

Cleverbot: No… My name is Cleverbot.

User: No… Your name is Ben.

Cleverbot: Correct.

He really is Ben

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing CleverBot conversation
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:65, topic:366155”]I said the first line
he said the second
and so forth

Hi babe. Do you have love? With you, Babe. What's your patronus? Single Do you want me to be your girlfriend? yes. Would you like to have sex? I would not. How come? Ive got a big penis! Never said I didn't. true, lets make love baby! Yes! oh god, you make me so horny. I love you! Hmmm, you aren't so clever right now. are you a bot? Not to my knowledge, no. Are you? yes you are How? Because your gay No, it's not. You made me sad, please have sex with me Do you need some tissues? Yes baby, I defiantly do I know you think you do know, but I also know that you don't actually know. item.description:
